```{r setup, include=FALSE}


file.names <- dir(getwd(), pattern =".csv")
    temp.summary<-data.frame(matrix(ncol = 9, nrow = 1)) 
    colnames(temp.summary) <- c("site", "start",	"end","tot_q_m3",	"duration_hrs",	"intensity_m3_hr",	"hyst_index",	"flsh_index",	"storm_id" )
            
    for(i in 1:length(file.names)){  
              
file <- read.table(file.names[i],header=TRUE, sep=",", stringsAsFactors=TRUE)

file[,1] = paste(file.names[i])
names(file)[1] ="site"

data2 <- select(file,c(site,start,end,tot_q_m3,duration_hrs,intensity_m3_hr,
                       hyst_index,flsh_index,storm_id))


temp.summary<-rbind(temp.summary,data2)

    }
    
write.csv(temp.summary,file = "R:/EcosystemEcologyLab/MSAPLANKTONdataDirectory/DataInDevelopment/Aggregations/AggregatedNEONdata/01_input/Turb_AllSites_2017_2022.csv")






```
